name: Apple Cider Vinegar
properties: Part of vinegar family for weight loss
benefits: Apple cider vinegar is made from fermented apple cider and provides a tangy, fruity acidity to dishes. It's commonly used in weight-loss recipes for its metabolic benefits. When mixed with miso paste, nutritional yeast, and other umami ingredients, it creates complex flavor profiles in soups and sauces. Like all vinegars, it should be consumed with meals for optimal weight-loss benefits.

quotes: Add the miso mixture to the soup along with the apple cider vinegar
1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar - in umami sauce
